meanings.definition: A unit of currency in Ethiopia.
meanings.sent1: In Ethiopia, you can buy many things with edhs.
meanings.sent2: I exchanged my dollars for edhs at the bank.
meanings.sent3: The edhs in my pocket jingled happily as I walked.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was worth more than a handful of edhs.
meanings.sent5: The colorful edhs sparkled in the sunlight.

meanings.definition: The plural form of 'edh', a letter of the Old English alphabet.
meanings.sent1: The book contained many edhs in its pages.
meanings.sent2: Can you find all the edhs in this text?
meanings.sent3: The edhs danced across the page in a merry parade.
meanings.sent4: His words were like edhs, ancient and mysterious.
meanings.sent5: The edhs stood out boldly among the other letters.

meanings.definition: The plural form of 'edh', a rune in the runic alphabet.
meanings.sent1: The runic stone was covered in intricate edhs.
meanings.sent2: The edhs on the ancient artifact were beautifully carved.
meanings.sent3: The edhs whispered secrets of the past to those who listened.
meanings.sent4: His mind was a labyrinth of edhs, each holding a different meaning.
meanings.sent5: The edhs glowed softly in the dim light of the museum.
